# Complete Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link Example

This example demonstrates a comprehensive deployment of Private DNS Zone Virtual Network Link with all available features and configurations.

## Features

- Full private_dns_zone_virtual_network_link configuration with all features enabled
- Advanced networking configuration
- Diagnostic settings for monitoring and auditing
- Complete lifecycle management
- Advanced security settings
- High availability configuration

## Key Configuration

This comprehensive example showcases all available features of the private_dns_zone_virtual_network_link module, demonstrating enterprise-grade capabilities suitable for production environments.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
